data.title: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות למפתחים בחברות גדולות וקטנות שמגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם

paragraphs.context: Cloudify believes in open principles as a core value – it’s everything the product is built on, as well as the culture of the company.  This means that we took the best of open source tooling and built a product on it – enabling you to play around with some of the best code today.  We also applied these values to the organization itself – building an atmosphere where everyone has a voice and can be a part of any initiative that empowers them, some of these include:
